Item.Description:
Welcome to the Stanford Anesthesia Preoperative Evaluation Clinic. In order to provide you with the highest level of anesthesia care, please take a few minutes to answer the following questions. Your complete medical information will enable us to develop an enhanced level of perioperative care and safety. Your active participartion may help improve your patient experience. We appreciate your time and effort.

Thank you,

Your Anesthesia Team
